title: Awaiting Indictment of Allied Forces for strategic bombing and planned starvation of German CIVILIANS
content: – by Shenali Waduge – The topic is accountability. The question is why has there been zero accountability of crimes against humanity committed by Allied Forces which specifically targeted civilian populations with strategic area bombing and post—war comprehensive starvation campaign that killed 2million German POWs and 5.7million German civilians – how else can such…
